plot outline: Although Gopalam (Rajendraprasad) is a renowned criminal lawyer of the city but when it comes to his wife Seeta (Sithara) he is powerless. And she indulges their son Pardu a lot, that is why he gets away with many things. But when he kissed a girl in the college, mother of that girl threatens to take revenge for her daughter's humiliation. Pardu fled to abroad to avoid complications. And while in abroad he fell in love with Meenakshi (Chahat). Will they get married or there will be some new troubles?
title: Gudu Gudu Gunjam
plot: Although Gopalam (Rajendraprasad) is a renowned criminal lawyer of the city but when it comes to his wife Seeta (Sithara) he is powerless. And she indulges their son Pardu a lot, that is why he gets away with many things. But when he kissed a girl in the college, mother of that girl threatens to take revenge for her daughter's humiliation. Pardu fled to abroad to avoid complications. And while in abroad he fell in love with Meenakshi (Chahat). Will they get married or there will be some new troubles?::Niaz Islam Arif

Interspersed with humour, this family-oriented relationship drama traces the twists and turns in the life of a carefree young man, who is the son of a successful criminal lawyer. He is spoiled as he has been has been pampered and coddled by his mother. When he travels to Bangkok due to a complex sequence of events and ends up falling in love with a beautiful woman there, his mother's deepest desire is to help him marry the girl of his dreams. However, would she be willing to break up her own marriage for her son's happiness?::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
